about_the_game:
Pitchfork Battles is an entertaining strategy game in which the player has to develop their settlement, starting with the extraction of timber and the construction of buildings, such as cowsheds and pigsties, which will help develop the village and ensure its prosperity. However, the player must take into account that resources are limited, so he will have to show his strategic thought in order to efficiently organize his resources and build the most efficient kingdom.
In addition, the player will have to wage war with neighboring enemy villages, using his army and heroes to attack and defend. The player must improve his army and strengthen the defense of his village in order to survive and win.



The construction of the settlement begins with the extraction of wood, and the lumberjack is an important member of the team. He not only supplies the players with the necessary resource, but is also one of the key characters needed for the prosperity of the village. Imagine how a lumberjack easily cuts trees into pieces without leaving a single chip around him. In this case, you can be sure that your settlement will receive enough wood for stable development.



The fisherman throws his catch out of the water with a quick movement of his hand every few seconds. Fish are an important source of food for a village, and a quality fisherman can help provide food. Located on the shores of a lake or the sea, fishing can be a very profitable activity for you. So, if you want to give impetus to the development of your settlement - hire a fisherman!



Peasants with pitchforks in their hands are ready to defend their homes and settlements at any cost. But remember, this is war! Enemies can be dangerous and extremely cunning, so your army must be ready for battle, action, and hardship. Develop your tactics, gather warriors and do your best to win!



The game is currently at an early stage of development. Write your ideas and wishes, and we will implement the most interesting ideas.
We also need your support - add the game to your wishlist, so you will help the development of the game and be the first to know the news.
